New Records: Lionel Messi became the fastest player in MLS history to reach 25 goal contributions with 12g/13a in 12 matches.
Key Match Events: Lionel Messi scored a brace in Argentina's 4-1 win over Guatemala in their final Copa América tune-up.
Messi tapped in from just outside the six-yard box to level in the 12th minute.
Messi clipped over an onrushing Hagen for Argentina's final goal of the night in the 77th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: There are no pre-game insights provided in the article.
Post-Match Reflections: Messi has been on a torrid pace for Supporters Shield-leading Inter Miami CF this season.
Messi and Argentina begin their Copa América title defense with a Group A clash against Canada at Atlanta United’s Mercedes-Benz Stadium on June 20.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The article mentions that Messi scored his first goal for Argentina since he struck for a brace against Peru in a World Cup qualifier in October.
